applications.title: Applications
applications.desc: As a Fullstack developer, I create high-performance web applications with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS on the front side, supplemented by Ruby on Rails and API integrations on the back side. This double expertise allows me to deliver complete web solutions, from responsive design to technical architecture. I undertake to produce elegant and intuitive interfaces while ensuring robustness and scalability, for projects that combine performance, user experience, and technical solidity.

lifoAI.title: LIFO.AI
lifoAI.desc: Work for LIFO.AI startup as a frontend developer, building an AI-driven inventory management platform with Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. The application leverages machine learning algorithms to optimize stock levels, forecast demand, and automate purchasing decisions. I developed responsive UI components that transform analytics into actionable business insights.

sportify.title: SPORTIFY
sportify.desc: Sportify is a PWA built with Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and Javascript with AJAX to connect users with sports partners by browsing or creating local events. We designed it in Figma, used Bootstrap for the UI, and deployed it on Heroku with a custom domain. The project was then presented in front of a big crowd.

gis.title: GIS PROJECT
gis.desc: This project is a web GIS application that allows users to visualize and interact with geospatial data. It was built using React, Leaflet, and Mapbox, and it includes features such as map layers, markers, and popups. The application is designed to be user-friendly and responsive.

carbonSavings.title: CARBON SAVINGS SIMULATOR
carbonSavings.desc: The Carbon Savings Simulator is a web app that shows what you save by biking instead of using a car or public transportation. It calculates carbon emissions, money saved, and calories burned, with graph visualizations for easy insights. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and the Mapbox API, it's user-friendly and responsive.

portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.desc: This portfolio was developed with Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind. Integrates a dark mode, next Intl for language support, animations with Framer Motion, advanced SEO optimization and deployed on Vercel. Showcases my projects and services in a modern and responsive interface with optimal performance.

tymouet.title: TY MOUET
tymouet.desc: Ty Mouet was our first project at Le Wagon, a seagull-themed Airbnb clone built with Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and AJAX. We handled a many-to-many database, deployed on Heroku, and worked in an agile team. Key features included booking logic, user authentication, and geolocation-based dynamic search.

movieWatchlist.title: MOVIES WATCHLIST
movieWatchlist.desc: The Movies Watchlist is a React and Redux application that helps users discover and organize movies using TMDB's database. Features include real-time search, categorized browsing, and a personal watchlist with ratings and comments. Built with Tailwind CSS and includes local storage for persistence.
